property.name: identifier
property.description: This is the default identifier set for internal processing.

property.name: isRetry
property.description: When this WebhookRequest was tried to be processed before we set this to not persist it again in the database.

property.name: isHandled
property.description: A Webhook can be accepted for later processing and setting this to false will keep it persisted. When true or null it will be removed from persistence.

property.name: identifier
property.description: The identifier will be set from outside and used to find previously unprocessed webhooks and execute them when possible.

property.name: sequenceNumber
property.description: This number will be set from outside. When there were already unprocessed webhooks for the same identifier this number will be increased.
